questions.quote: Okay, so we're going to get the wine and we'll pick you up here in ten minutes.
I will. Besides, she's got a boyfriend, Jerry, you know him. Dan. Remember, we went to that party at his house?
Hey Elaine? Put me down for some of that art. 1,900 dollars worth.
Should I get it? I hate these moments. I'm hearing the dual voices now, you know, "What about the money?" "What's money?"
Uh, yeah. I found it on the street. It's gotta be worth something.
Oh my God, it's 7:01. What have I done? My whole plan is depending on Kramer? Have I learned nothing? How could I make such a stupid mistake? He'll never show up!
Well, I happened to be eating at Poppie's when I told him the "old" idea, and his eyes - waaaaaah! - just lit up. You know, he wants to back it.
Yeah, yeah.  You know, it's a... it's a funny thing about that bird dying. I hid the key in Fredo's food dish. Whoo! That's a weeeird coincidence.
Oh, Jerry. I don't know how you could do this. I'm so nervous for you.
THIS is your daughter? My God! My God! I I hope you don't mind my saying. She is breathtaking.
